summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Little Luxe GETAWAYS travel inquiry form and admin dashboard. All core functionality working correctly including 7-step form wizard, backend API endpoints, admin dashboard with filtering/searching, and inquiry detail management.

minor_issues.issue: POST request returns status 200 instead of 201
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works correctly but status code doesn't follow REST conventions

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and Start Planning button
Multi-step inquiry form wizard navigation (7 steps)
Form field validation and data entry
Form submission creates inquiry via POST /api/inquiries
Thank you page displays after successful submission
Admin dashboard loads with stats and inquiry list
Admin inquiry detail view with comprehensive information
Backend API endpoints (GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE)
